title: Lyme Disease - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/4/21
itunes:title: Lyme Disease - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/4/21
description:
George Noory and author Vir McCoy recount his ongoing battle with the tick born lyme disease, what some of the symptoms are, and how his struggles increased when the disease was misdiagnosed.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
